oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. Katherine Southerland letter, May 6, 1922.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Katherine Southerland, Chairman Tennessee Delegation, National Women's Party, Washington, D.C. May 6, 1922. Re: Tennessee delegation to the dedication of the National Women's Party Headquarters on May 21; President Harding will participate, invited to attend and urged to join the organization. Lizzie Crozier French Papers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Organizations; Building dedications; Women's rights;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Katherine Southerland, National Women's Party
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
